Delna’s Industrial Exhaust Fans are designed for high-volume air movement in harsh environments like factories, workshops, and warehouses. Built with pure copper motors, aluminium bodies, and bearing-type mechanisms for peak reliability.
features: 100% Pure Copper Motor for high-efficiency operation
Rust-resistant aluminium body – durable yet lightweight
Bearing-type motor for smooth rotation and low noise
High air delivery to eliminate fumes, heat, and stale air
Designed for continuous use in tough industrial conditions
Available in 15, 18, 24 inches

Warehouses & Storage Rooms – Maintains air circulation

products.name: Delna Deep Surface Light – 15W High Lumen
products.description: Deep Box Compatible. Surface Light Look. Smart Illumination. The Delna Deep Surface Light (15W) offers the elegance of surface lights with the practicality of deep box mounting. Ideal for false ceilings, POP, and PVC panels, it combines high lumen output with sleek design and effortless installation.
features: 15 Watt High Brightness – 1350–1500 lumens for strong illumination
Hybrid Design – Fits into deep box, looks like a surface light
Downward Light Spread – Even diffusion with no shadows
Low Heat, Long Life – 25,000+ hours lifespan with thermal protection
Voltage Stabilized – Operates on 100V–300V AC with surge safety
Quick Installation – Holder screws included, fits standard deep boxes

No extra frame or cutout required
Built for Indian ceilings & junction boxes

products.name: Delna MCBs & RCCBs
products.description: Protect your electrical circuits with Delna’s high-performance MCBs and RCCBs, engineered for durability, precision, and safety in both residential and industrial applications.
features: Miniature Circuit Breakers (MCB): Type C Curve – Suitable for general use and inductive loads; trips between 5-10 times the rated current.
MD Trip (Magnetic Dual Trip) Facility – Provides fast disconnection during short circuits and ensures thermal protection against overload.
Mid Trip Feature – The switch handle clearly shows mid-position when tripped, helping you easily identify fault conditions—neither ON nor OFF, but a visible 'trip' status.
RCCB (Residual Current Circuit Breaker): Detects and disconnects leakage currents to prevent electric shocks.
Ensures enhanced protection for human safety and fire prevention.

specifications.Available Configurations: 2 Pole, 3 Pole, TPN (Triple Pole with Neutral)
